title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin out, Joy Taylor steps in to react to another huge move in the NBA with the Packers trading 2x All Pro wide receiver Davante Adams to the Raiders and why this takes Aaron Rodgers out of the hunt for another Super Bowl. She explains the chaotic state of the relationship between Baker Mayfield and the Browns and why Mayfield needs to take responsibility for his role in the downfall. She talks to Super Bowl Champion Will Blackmon joins the show to talk about which QB is under more pressure next season: Aaron Rodgers or Russell Wilson?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
